Class GraphDocument

java.lang.Object
  ca.gedge.opgraph.app.GraphDocument

public class GraphDocument
extends Object

Document model used for graphs.

Method Detail

hasModifications

public boolean hasModifications()
Gets whether or not the model has modifications.

Returns:
true if there are modifications to this model, false otherwise

checkForReset

public boolean checkForReset()
Checks to see if the graph can be reset without losing any modifications.

Returns:
true if the graph can be reset without losing any modifications, false otherwise.

reset

public void reset(File source,
                  OpGraph root)
Reset the state of the application to a new graph.

Parameters:
source - the file the graph was read from, or null if the graph wasn't read from a file
root - the graph to now use as root

markAsUnmodified

public void markAsUnmodified()
Marks the model as unmodified in its current state. Note that currently this will discard all undoable edits!!!
